snippet: A documentary filmmaker and licensed cabby secretly recorded the conversations of his passengers, assembled the highlights into an audio collage and installed the final product in his taxi.
abstract: Documentary filmmaker and licensed New York City cab driver Daniel J Wilson has created art installation in his taxi that consists of secretly recorded conversations of his passengers, edited and assembled into an audio collage.
lead_paragraph: A documentary filmmaker and licensed cabby secretly recorded the conversations of his passengers, assembled the highlights into an audio collage and installed the final product in his taxi.

headline.seo: Cab Riders’ Riffs, Secretly Recorded for the Sake of Art
headline.main: Riffs by Cab Riders, Secretly Recorded for the Sake of Art
headline.print_headline: Riffs by Cab Riders, Secretly Recorded for the Sake of Art
